Summary: V-shaped object that changed shaped to a straight line with star like lights near it.Almost as if they were being signaled by the V-shaped object
divs: Sighting DetailsOn sept.18th 2009,looking towards the west(I live near the La Brea Tar pits in Los Angeles,I saw what looked like a hang glider with a morning star next to it.The objects where very high in the sky.As I continued to observe them, the V-shaped object straightened out.It was like a line of light,then changed to a C-shaped,then back to a V shape,then straight,then C-shaped.It keep repeating this pattern.The star or light next to it became brighter.This was as I was standing in front of my apt.building.I continued on to The La Brea(5 min.s away by car) Tar pits where I take my dog in the morning.I pointed it out to some other people at the park.There remarks where,"that I have really good eyes" to have spotted the objects. as I looked a little south of the objects, three more bright lights(looked like stars) appeared.These were over The Variety Building on Wilshire Blvd. if ur familar with the area,but very high in the sky.2 more light appeared with the V shaped object.Between 8:30& 9 am.Shortly after 9am,the lights and object disappeared.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around September 18th 2009
